title: What's wrong with the front page?
body:
It's still displaying posts from 3+ days ago.

edit: picture

https://i.gyazo.com/005a0fd36255dffb24553ddbe00fcbda.png

replies.body: The issue appears to have been resolved. Thank you for the report!
I'm not sure it has, it's currently showing me stuff from 1-2 days ago.  Nothing shown in hours
Yup, it also shows some posts downvoted into oblivion for me.

I made a post about this too
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/rsEpYAyZ-why-are-all-the-posts-in-hot-multiple-days-old

I wonder how many posts about it haven't gotten any attention because they can't get on the front page...
This is definitely some sort of bug or error. I've spent loads of time on the boards and this isn't right.
Itâ€™s likely to be an extension of the problems we saw from the Boards downtime 3 days ago. Investigating further.
thank you, a developer, for responding appropriately and not being another "it's not a bug" comment.

What if I said it wasn't a bug, but a feature?

Is that still a meme?

> [{quoted}](name=Imperial Pandaa,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=Y6RTc5AQ,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-02-13T06:16:39.275+0000)
>
> What if I said it wasn't a bug, but a feature?
> 
> Is that still a meme?

A colleague of mine used to say: 

"A feature is just a bug in a tuxedo."
If you are sorting by hot, then there is probably nothing wrong. Try by New or Recent.
Probably because there are no new noteworthy threads.
